name: Island Cabin Real Estate Tour
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse to look around
  • Left click to interact (cursor will be green)
  • Enter to open the navigation menu
  • Escape to exit the app

This is a student project for a Certificate IV Information Technology (Game Development) class at SMTAFE. 

The purpose of the project is to design an app which showcases a 'remote' real estate property and allow prospective buyers to perform a virtual tour to examine the property without having to travel out to it physically.

The cabin, island and most other assets were all provided as part of a package for the assessment. Code for travelling between waypoint markers and opening/closing the tooltips were also provided.

The waypoint markers themselves and information tooltips were modelled by me and the code for opening/closing the navigation window and teleporting to specific markers was also written by me. Audio for the narration was provided by me.

The ambient music track is taken from YouTube sound library under creative commons.

Likewise the interaction sounds were taken from freesound.org.
